## Translation Status

<!-- For new languages, confirm completion -->

- [ ] All keys from en.json are translated
- [ ] Translations are accurate and natural
- [ ] Tested in Home Assistant
- [ ] No UI truncation or overflow issues
- [ ] Culturally appropriate

## Translation Quality Checklist

- [ ] Used appropriate formality level
- [ ] Consistent terminology throughout
- [ ] Natural phrasing (not literal translation)
- [ ] Checked for spelling and grammar
- [ ] Verified technical terms are correct
